channel.title: IRC Legend for all!
channel.description: You heard it here first folks, anyone who posts in this thread has my permission to receive the IRC Legend award!

item.title: IRC Legend for all!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:

I still call lies. Don’t believe it.
[/quote]

rock gets eroded

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Legend for all!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Classic:

No, first of all. I have used different names on MITBNet such as jClassic, Classic_, c_, etc. I went on before the .xxx update as well on #fagsrus, #mopar, #moparscape. I did idle on #mopar but not really talk. So I don’t know what you’re talking about with 4 months. Also: The IRC legend isn’t just about idling any more, more as to activity… And I think I’ve shown a lot of that for the past year

there have been people who have used the irc for 2-3 years who do not have the award

moparisthebest.com has been around for OVER 6 and a half YEARS, many people who frequent #mopar have been there since the start and they are the people who make the channel and should get the award, evidence of them being the life of the channel is clear when you consider that #moparscape goes through extreme bouts of inactivity and generally gets new faces every few months, whereas #mopar has generally always been active

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Legend for all!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:41, topic:462585”]Easy to say from someone that has a joint award

But we are though anyways, that’s what the whole big change was for a while ago.[/quote]

Not just because my award is joint I was hoping I’d still have it on mitb if we did split lol. I meant as though fully split, for example overall global mods are only mitb moderators, our accounts are totally separate; that kind of thing.

Also Classic: Mopman, Niall, Speljohan just to name a few of them deserve it more than you. I’m not saying you don’t deserve it, you just weren’t the most deserving.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Legend for all!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Classic, post:42, topic:462585”]No, first of all. I have used different names on MITBNet such as jClassic, Classic_, c_, etc. I went on before the .xxx update as well on #fagsrus, #mopar, #moparscape. I did idle on #mopar but not really talk. So I don’t know what you’re talking about with 4 months. Also: The IRC legend isn’t just about idling any more, more as to activity… And I think I’ve shown a lot of that for the past year

I can find a topic on moparisthebest about a year and a half ago about IRC Quotes, which I started

Ah: Found it

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,528229.0.html[/quote]9 months is half of a year an a half But still, all of the people I listed have been on there longer, which was my point. I was just looking for the name Classic (which included Classic_) when I searched my logs, which is when you really became active

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Legend for all!
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:37, topic:462585”]It’s not so much Classic having it, it’s people like Niall, Mopman, etc not having it, and then Classic gets it after 4 months of being on IRC. Even people like Rix_, jmood, Tom, veer, and ytuio9 have been on longer and for the most part are more active. Sure, I’m bitching about it, but it’s not worse than people in this topic begging to have it I’m not going to lie, I just don’t think Classic deserves the title IRC Legend, compared to other people on IRC. No offense to him, but it just doesn’t fit in with what the award meant before. He still gets kicked from #mopar :rolleyes:

On a somewhat related note, how would people feel about there just being different awards for MPSC than MITB? We’re becoming more independent anyways, I think having different awards would be cool. MPSC Version of IRC Legend could be about #moparscape, or whatever. (Ps - it’s just my idea, hasn’t been discussed by any staff)[/quote]

No, first of all. I have used different names on MITBNet such as jClassic, Classic_, c_, etc. I went on before the .xxx update as well on #fagsrus, #mopar, #moparscape. I did idle on #mopar but not really talk. So I don’t know what you’re talking about with 4 months. Also: The IRC legend isn’t just about idling any more, more as to activity… And I think I’ve shown a lot of that for the past year

I can find a topic on moparisthebest about a year and a half ago about IRC Quotes, which I started

Ah: Found it

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Legend for all!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:37, topic:462585”]It’s not so much Classic having it, it’s people like Niall, Mopman, etc not having it, and then Classic gets it after 4 months of being on IRC. Even people like Rix_, jmood, Tom, veer, and ytuio9 have been on longer and for the most part are more active. Sure, I’m bitching about it, but it’s not worse than people in this topic begging to have it I’m not going to lie, I just don’t think Classic deserves the title IRC Legend, compared to other people on IRC. No offense to him, but it just doesn’t fit in with what the award meant before. He still gets kicked from #mopar :rolleyes:

On a somewhat related note, how would people feel about there just being different awards for MPSC than MITB? We’re becoming more independent anyways, I think having different awards would be cool. MPSC Version of IRC Legend could be about #moparscape, or whatever. (Ps - it’s just my idea, hasn’t been discussed by any staff)[/quote]

Until we’re completely separate then I think we should keep the joint awards.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Legend for all!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:37, topic:462585”]It’s not so much Classic having it, it’s people like Niall, Mopman, etc not having it, and then Classic gets it after 4 months of being on IRC. Even people like Rix_, jmood, Tom, veer, and ytuio9 have been on longer and for the most part are more active. Sure, I’m bitching about it, but it’s not worse than people in this topic begging to have it I’m not going to lie, I just don’t think Classic deserves the title IRC Legend, compared to other people on IRC. No offense to him, but it just doesn’t fit in with what the award meant before. He still gets kicked from #mopar :rolleyes:

On a somewhat related note, how would people feel about there just being different awards for MPSC than MITB? We’re becoming more independent anyways, I think having different awards would be cool. MPSC Version of IRC Legend could be about #moparscape, or whatever. (Ps - it’s just my idea, hasn’t been discussed by any staff)[/quote]I think the whole integration of accounts throughout the mopar forums should stay however, there should be independent badges to each set of forums. Like MoparCraft has. And like david said, we’re growing more independent so lets push for it. I do think it would be easier to do now since we now have a very active administrator who is helping to refine the communities.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC Legend for all!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s not so much Classic having it, it’s people like Niall, Mopman, etc not having it, and then Classic gets it after 4 months of being on IRC. Even people like Rix_, jmood, Tom, veer, and ytuio9 have been on longer and for the most part are more active. Sure, I’m bitching about it, but it’s not worse than people in this topic begging to have it I’m not going to lie, I just don’t think Classic deserves the title IRC Legend, compared to other people on IRC. No offense to him, but it just doesn’t fit in with what the award meant before. He still gets kicked from #mopar :rolleyes:

On a somewhat related note, how would people feel about there just being different awards for MPSC than MITB? We’re becoming more independent anyways, I think having different awards would be cool. MPSC Version of IRC Legend could be about #moparscape, or whatever. (Ps - it’s just my idea, hasn’t been discussed by any staff)

Read full topic
